Group Subs Accessibility Audit

2025-09-03

Context

Ticket was broad and complex, making scope unclear and timeline unrealistic.

My Contribution

Completed a thorough review using Jira AI to break down the work into five key areas, identified complexity, and worked with PMs and stakeholders to extend the deadline and split off part of the work

Outcome / Impact

Provided clarity on scope, avoided delivery risks, and improved cross-functional alignment.

Learned some of the power of Jira's AI. Very interested in exploring this tool more.

Jira: ET-2319 Jira: ET-2404
